title: Murder arrest after death of woman in her 80s
description: A 63-year-old woman has been arrested following an incident at a flat in Devizes.
content:
A woman has been arrested on suspicion of murder after a woman in her 80s died in an incident at a flat.
Police were called to the flat in Keepers Road, Devizes, at about 08:10 GMT after reports of a serious assault.

title: Two men feared missing in sea off Devon beach on Christmas Day
description: Emergency services launched major search at Budleigh Salterton after reports of people in difficulty in the water
content:
Two men are believed to be missing in the water off a beach in Devon, after a number of people were reported to be in difficulty.
Emergency services were called to Budleigh Salterton at 10.25am on Christmas Day following concerns for people in the wa... [1972 chars]

title: Nosy researcher’s quest to map the world’s ‘smellscapes’
description: We can share images and sounds, so why not smells? Dr Kate McLean-MacKenzie hopes her new atlas will make scents
content:
Christmas may be associated with the aromas of oranges and mince pies but our towns and cities also boast special scents during the rest of the year. Now, one researcher is publishing an atlas attempting to capture these quirky “smellscapes”.

description: Happy Christmas, glitterati! Tissues at the ready for Tess and Claud’s last hurrah. Join us for every minute of this tinsel-strewn tearjerker

title: Woman in her 80s dies on Christmas Day after serious assault inside flat in Devizes
description: Police say a 63-year-old woman who was known to the victim has been arrested and is in hospital with injuries which are not life-changing.
content:
Police say a woman in her 80s has died after a serious assault inside a flat in Wiltshire on Christmas Day.
A 63-year-old woman who is known to the victim has been arrested on suspicion of murder, said Wiltshire Police.
She has been taken to hospital... [820 chars]
